Fauci's Alarmism

Fauci’s Alarmism {#h.laisb83c6gtv .zfr3Q .JYVBee dir=”ltr” style=”text-align: center;”}

As Mike Fumento and I recall from his days as an AIDS fear-monger and alarmist, Fauci’s track record was horrible even before he messed up the C19 response! Why wasn’t he fired decades ago?
